name: Cordout
description:
Cordout is a Singleplayer arcade-like game based off of the theme for CCCJam1 "Playing both sides" The goal of Cordout is to stop robot vacuums from reaching and unplugging the power cable of a recordplayer untill both sides of the record have been played.

Thanks to "DRKfr" for the music asset. Other than that everything is made by me.

Hi, im Snootnoot a new hobbiest gamedev if you enjoyed(or didn't) please leave any feedback and/or constructive criticism. Thanks

P.S

This is my first game jam also,

X marks the spot : )
